content: We should add micro animation at places
There's one more on that branch:
Streams compass should do rotation on hover i think
I don't think I like such animations on hover since I find them distracting.
I edited the topic for that first message again
I meant to suggest the "explore" icon in #design > Rename "Add streams "

Oh, btw, these are lottie powered animations available from https://useanimations.com/.
I recommend a look through those to see if there are any we'd be interested in.

Yeah, that sort of micro animation on hover seems counterproductive to me. The right places in my mind for that type of attention-grabbing animation would be something where we want to draw the user's attention to something; but I don't see why we'd want to draw the user's eyes to the envelope on "Private messages" on hover.

It doesn't have to be on-hover, and I'm not sure we'd want it, I was mostly experimenting with both Lottie and that animation library.

A potentially interesting use could be having it be open when you have unreads and closed when there are none, playing the open animation when a user gets a new unread and has Zulip open and playing the close animation when the user marks the last PM as read... but the unread counter does show it well enough so maybe not.
